Uses of Interface
com.poesys.db.connection.IConnectionFactory

  • Packages that use IConnectionFactory 
    Package Description
    com.poesys.db.connection  

    • Uses of IConnectionFactory in com.poesys.db.connection

      Classes in com.poesys.db.connection that implement IConnectionFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JndiConnectionFactory
      A factory for Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) data connections.
      class  JndiMysqlConnectionFactory
      Create a special JNDI Factory for MySQL.
      class  JndiOracleConnectionFactory
      Create a special JNDI Factory for MySQL.
      class  JndiSybaseConnectionFactory
      Create a special JNDI Factory for MySQL.
      class  MySqlConnectionFactory
      A factory for MySQL connections.
      class  OracleConnectionFactory
      A factory for Oracle connections.
      class  PooledConnectionFactory
      A factory for JDBC connections.
      class  SybaseConnectionFactory
      A factory for Sybase connections.
      Fields in com.poesys.db.connection with type parameters of type IConnectionFactory 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IConnectionFactory> ConnectionFactoryFactory.cache
      Map of IConnectionFactory objects keyed on subsystem name (String)
      Methods in com.poesys.db.connection that return IConnectionFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IConnectionFactory ConnectionFactoryFactory.getInstance(IConnectionFactory.DBMS dbms)
      Get the singleton instance of the default connection factory.
      static IConnectionFactory ConnectionFactoryFactory.getInstance(java.lang.String subsystem)
      Get the singleton instance of the connectionfactory for a specific subsystem using the default DBMS defined in the database.properties file.
      static IConnectionFactory ConnectionFactoryFactory.getInstance(java.lang.String subsystem, IConnectionFactory.DBMS dbms)
      Get the singleton instance of the connection factory for a specific subsystem given the DBMS.
